abstract.text: A parser that consumes a subsequence from the beginning of its input.

of elements and return them as output. It can be configured with minimum and maximum lengths,

numbers are consumed, you could introduce a minimum

A parser that can parse streams of input.

from the beginning of a string.

if it fails.

performance, generality, and ergonomics.
A parser that consumes a
value from the beginning of a string.
A parser that consumes the first element from a collection.
A parser that consumes a subsequence from the beginning of its input up to a given sequence of

A parser that returns the subsequence of input consumed by another parser.

that can incrementally “print” an output value back into an input.
